title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 4 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2015.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 919.98 was recorded at Year 2012
Min Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 676.52 was recorded at Year 2015
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars with a total of 4 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is decreasing which exists from 2015 to 2012.
